plot outline: Mada (Vijay), an innocent boy from a middle-class family, wants to build a palatial house and then get married and treat her like a queen. His dreams are shattered when circumstances force him to take on politician Kanchi Kote (Rangayana Raghu) and expose all his misdeeds. Irritated by the turn of events, the politician sends his henchmen to kill Mada. The brutal attack makes him lose his memory and he goes mad in despair.
